definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]

sentences.english: Modern investigation and supervision originates from law supervision theory of Soviet Russia and Russia law system.
sentences.chinese: 現代的偵查監督淵源於蘇俄法系的法律監督理論。

sentences.english: The 1918 Soviet Russia constitution validated the highest organ of state power supervision system.
sentences.chinese: 1918年蘇俄憲法確認了最高國家權力機關監督制。

sentences.english: Until World War II, Soviet Russia was the only example of a Communist regime.
sentences.chinese: 直到二戰爲止，蘇俄是唯一存在的共產政權的實例。

sentences.english: Wilson Administration's Soviet Russian policy holds an important position in the American diplomatic history.
sentences.chinese: 威爾遜政府的蘇俄政策在美國外交史佔有重要地位。

sentences.english: The Mil Mi-8is a Soviet/Russian multipurpose helicopter, developed in the early 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 米8是蘇俄在1960年代早期開發的多功能直升機。

definition: Vladimir Ilyich Lenin (1870-1924), Russian revolutionary leader
to forfeit sovereignty and humiliate the country (idiom)/to surrender territory under humiliating terms
to break up into components/to disintegrate/to collapse/to crumble
Chinese Civil War, also known as War of Liberation 解放戰爭|解放战争[Jie3 fang4 Zhan4 zheng1]
